titleStmt.title: St. Paul's thanksgiving: set forth in a sermon preached before the right honorable House of Peers in the Abby-Church Westminster, on Thursday May 10. being the day of solemn thanksgivng to almighty God for his late blessings upon this kingdom. By James Buck, B.D. Vicar of Stradbrook in Suff. and domestick chaplian to the right honorable Theophilus Earl of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Buck, James.

titleStmt.title: St. Paul's thanksgiving: set forth in a sermon preached before the right honorable House of Peers in the Abby-Church Westminster, on Thursday May 10. being the day of solemn thanksgivng to almighty God for his late blessings upon this kingdom. By James Buck, B.D. Vicar of Stradbrook in Suff. and domestick chaplian to the right honorable Theophilus Earl of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Buck, James.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.G. for John Playford at his shop in the Temple, near the Church door,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print on verso of title page dated at head: Die Veneris, II. Maii 1660. and signed by: Jo. Browne, Cleric. Parliamentor.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
